lines.text:
[During a preview of Flesh and the Devil]
Call the fire department. The screen is gonna burst into flames.

[Facing a barrage of reporters]
Oh, go away, leave me alone!
If I thought actors were gonna have to talk, I would've stayed in the junk business!

[after the premiere, to Greta]
Garbo talks!

You know, the truth is MGM needs me about as much as it needs another blonde starlet with a cute behind. You knock on any ten doors in this town, another Jack Gilbert will answer five, with a perfect smile, glint in his eye.

[after learning of John Gilbert's death]
I almost married him once, you know.
